name: Rhydon

attacks.name: Ram
attacks.text: Rhydon does 20 damage to itself. If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon. Switch the Pokémon even if Rhydon is Knocked Out.)

flavorText: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3600 degrees.

strengths: Lightning resistance is valuable against Electabuzz
weaknesses: Ram forces a switch which opponent controls

competitiveHistory: Rhydon from Jungle had the highest HP of any Stage 1 in the early sets at 100 HP. The Lightning resistance was valuable against Electabuzz. However, the self-damage and forced switch from Ram, combined with the heavy energy requirement and Grass weakness to the common Scyther, limited its competitive use.

rulings.ruling: Ram's switch happens even if Rhydon is Knocked Out by its own recoil damage.
The opponent chooses which of their Benched Pokemon switches in.
